reviews.text: We booked 2 lower rate standard rooms. Upon arrival at Hirayu Onsen we called to request for their free pick-up from the bus stop near the ryokan (Nakau Kougen Gutchi Bus Stop). Once alighting from the bus there was a minivan waiting for us. Otherwise it would have taken us around 10 minutes slow walk.
reviews.title: Wow Wow Wow!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Check-in was smooth and we were taken to our room. It was lovely! We got a large room in the main building with an alcove as well as an outdoor balcony. We must have been upgraded since my correspondences with them requesting for a room with an alcove received a reply that our room rate was for a room with no alcove and the room would be located in the annex.
reviews.title: Excellent Ryokan

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The view was a bit dissappointing since the river wasn't that nice... Water wasn't blue like other parts of Japan and there were just lots of rocks and trees with no leaf. I guess it was still recovering from winter. But it was still lovely sitting at the table by the alcove facing the river and listening to the running water...
reviews.title: Laid back luxury hot spring in the mountains

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room had a kotatsu, which is a low, wooden table frame covered by a futon, upon which a table top sits. It was nice and toasty. I only wish that when we were there the temperature was colder! And we didn't spend enough time in the room to utilize it... What a pity...
reviews.title: Expensive hideaway with great baths

reviews.text: After a while we changed into the yukata and headed for the onsens. I really wanted to try the mixed bath since that had the nicest view... So shame on me but I wore my bathers :( Later I saw some Japanese ladies wearing the large towels. It was not crowded though... We didn't even have to share the mix bath with men... Most of the time it was just me and one friend.
reviews.title: Very beautiful hotel in the middle of the mountains.
